A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a complete disgrace to the Star Wars legacy. The script is terrible. The characters have no development whatsoever. Watching it felt like being slapped in the face repeatedly by Disney for 2 1/2 hours. This is coming from a die-hard Star Wars fan. Also\, Star Wars is an action/adventure story\, not a comedy. And Luke Skywalker would NEVER throw his light saber over his shoulder.
